frontmatter.title: Helsinki 2018
frontmatter.venue_address: Keilaranta 1 02150 Espoo, Finland Auditorium, ground floor
frontmatter.lead_text: The OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held in Helsinki (Espoo) just a day before Red Hat Forum Finland 2018 at Keilaranta 1 02150 Espoo, Finland Auditorium, ground floor!
frontmatter.info_text: The OpenShift Commons Gathering brings together experts from all over the world to discuss container technologies, best practices for cloud native application developers and the open source software projects that underpin the OpenShift ecosystem. The Helsinki event will gather developers, devops professionals and sysadmins together to explore the next steps in making container technologies successful and secure.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Making Collaboration that Works
State of the Cloud: Update on OpenShift 3.x
Case Study: Moving Workloads to OpenShift Online (GameRefinery)
User Panel - moderated by Diane Mueller (Red Hat)
Open Innovation Lab and Changing the Culture
What's Next AMA Panel - moderated by Carol Chen (Red Hat)
Evening Reception and Networking Event with Mustan Virran Panimo
